Class Shopping

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shopping
  • public class Shopping
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the user interface class that handles the input commands, output data and messages.
    Author:
    Kaivalya Mishra, Ridwanur Sarder

      Shopping()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private ShoppingBag addCommand​(java.util.StringTokenizer tokens, ShoppingBag bag)
      Adds an object of type GroceryItem initialized by input tokens to a ShoppingBag object.
      private void checkingOutCommand​(ShoppingBag bag)
      Checks out all the objects in the shopping bag, emptying it afterwards.
      private void displayCommand​(ShoppingBag bag)
      Displays the contents of a shopping bag.

      Removes an object of type GroceryItem described by input tokens from a ShoppingBag object.
      void run()
      User interface method to emulate a shopping bag and shopping functions.

      • Shopping

        public Shopping()

    • Method Detail

      • addCommand

        private ShoppingBag addCommand​(java.util.StringTokenizer tokens,
                               ShoppingBag bag)
        Adds an object of type GroceryItem initialized by input tokens to a ShoppingBag object.
        Parameters:
        tokens - in the add request(item name, price, and taxable)
        bag - prior to addition of item
        Returns:
        updated shopping bag with item added

      • removeCommand

        private ShoppingBag removeCommand​(java.util.StringTokenizer tokens,
                                  ShoppingBag bag)
        Removes an object of type GroceryItem described by input tokens from a ShoppingBag object. If item is not found in the ShoppingBag object, prints out a message saying so.
        Parameters:
        tokens - in the remove request(item name, price, and taxable)
        bag - prior to removal of item
        Returns:
        updated shopping bag with item removed

      • displayCommand

        private void displayCommand​(ShoppingBag bag)
        Displays the contents of a shopping bag.
        Parameters:
        bag - to display contents of

      • checkingOutCommand

        private void checkingOutCommand​(ShoppingBag bag)
        Checks out all the objects in the shopping bag, emptying it afterwards. If bag is empty, will display a message saying so. Prints out the items being checked out, sales total, sales tax, and total amount paid.
        Parameters:
        bag - to be checked out

      • run

        public void run()
        User interface method to emulate a shopping bag and shopping functions. Commands include add, remove, display, check out, and quit.
